inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Stamp

see Signed; on back, in pencil: [1907], [B1] and [480]
markings: on back, stamped in brown: [MUSEUM / (griffon wearing crown) / STETTIN]
provenance: [Städtische Kupferstichsammlung, L.2312d, (The Print Room founded in 1884), Stettin]; [James A. Bergquist, Boston, until 1990; sold in August for IOOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1990-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [15 HB 45 / JOHANNES BROSAMER / FULDAE DESENS / FACTEBAT.]
title: Samson and Delilah
